data.name: How much does this inspection service cost?
data.description:
ABC Inspection company has a new pricing table. The standard man day cost is ```$315/day```, but there will be a discount for customer ordered for more manday The discount calcuated based on 2 parameter - ```manday``` and ```sample size``` Here are the rules to calcuate the discount :
  1. More than(or equal to) ```10 days``` and ```50 sample size```, there will be a ```50% off``` per man day
  2. More than(or equal to) ```5 days``` and ```25 sample size```, there will be a ```30% off``` per man day
  3. More than(or equal to) ```2 days``` and ```15 sample size```, there will be a ```15% off``` per man day

If the number of manday are not falling into above criteria, there will no discount applied.

The discounted manday ```must be in an integer```, if the result are in float, a ```ceiling rule will be aplpied``` (e.g. If the discounted man day cost = ```170.5```, the final charge will be ```171``` ) Also there is a minimum sameple size vary by manday :
  1. More(or equals to ) ```10 man day```, minimum sample size is ```50```
  2. More(or equals to ) ```5 man day```, minimum sample size is ```25```
  3. More(or equals to ) ```2 man day```, minimum sample size is ```15```
Your task is write a function to calcuate the final cost of manday. And ```don't forget to add a'$' sign in the final result```
